text: Theory of population may refer to: *Malthusianism, a theory of population by Thomas Malthus (1766–1834) ** An Essay on the Principle of Population, the book in which Malthus propounded his theory *Neo-Malthusian theory of Paul R. Ehrlich (born 1932) and others *Theory of demographic transition by Warren Thompson (1887–1973) ==See also== *Demography *Population *Population growth *Population bottleneck *Population ecology
title: Theory of population
